summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5900 for the improvement of Michigan Street, from Corson Avenue to East Marginal Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77894, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
